website_summaries.verdict: The best overall drift trike that offers a perfect blend of power with the assist of an electric motor.
pros: Easy control interface to use the battery and motor while pedaling
The battery can last up to 30 minutes while running at speeds up to 9 miles per hour
cons: Motor wire connections can cut out, requiring repairs

website_summaries.verdict: It’s so easy to slide, spin, and cruise around on this electric tricycle, that big kids and grown-ups will be jealous as they watch some lucky kid have a blast.
pros: Top speed of 9 miles per hour
Extremely simple push-button and handbrake operation
Riders can drift and pull off exciting spins with ease
40 minutes of ride time per charge
cons: Only for riders weighing 120 pounds or less

customer_reviews.title: You should get it- says a 9 year old
customer_reviews.text: Hi I am 9 years old. This is my bike I got for xmas- it is awesome but it can be poopy because it has to charge for like 12 hours to fully charge. You get like an hour of riding it before it dies. It is fast but the weight limit is like 107 pounds because it is real slow with my 12 year old big sister on it.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna S.

customer_reviews.title: My boys love these!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our 5 year old twin boys for Christmas and they love them!! The only reason I'm giving a 4 star is because I wish the seat had an option for adjusting! My boys can't reach the pegs, so we have to put a pillow behind their backs. They've rode them three times and so far no issues!
customer_reviews.author: Breezey702

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gifts!
customer_reviews.text: These things are amazingly fun. Bought two of them for our twins 9th birthday. They play on them every day. Surprised they last on a charge as long as they do. Reviews were poor when it came to play time (20-30 min) but these usually last about an hour or so. Our kids are fairly small for their size so maybe that helps. It zips them around quickly and they have a blast. Much safer than the two wheeled scooters and way more fun to play with I think. Definitely glad we bought these
customer_reviews.author: TCH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My son is 6.5 and he LOVES this!!!! My older kids (10&12) like taking turns on it too! I even got on it once!
customer_reviews.author: meJen716

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my boys as a birthday gift. One of them wouldn’t charge at all and after a replacement the second one wouldn’t charge either. So when we went out to ride them I had to force them to take turns. Well we barely went a mile and now he has to push it home. After charging for two days. We are stuck with one because we are out of the return period but I am sending back the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Nic

customer_reviews.title: Happily surprised, super fun ride
customer_reviews.text: My son showed me the video for this and I was skeptical that it would preform the way it appeared to online. However, it is exactly as described and super fun! He wishes the battery lasted longer but he cruises around our cul-de-sac for about an hour or more before he has to plug it in. My 3 year old wants desperately to ride it but it goes too fast for him to control safely.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Should have listened to other reviewers!
customer_reviews.text: Although this item received several complaints on Amazon about it breaking, I bought it for my 5 year old daughter for Christmas in hopes Razor had resolved the issues. Nope. The motor seized within the first 2 days. Amazon was fantastic and replaced it, so she’s been riding the replacement for a few days now ....I’m hoping for a better result because when it works, it’s a blast!!
customer_reviews.author: Darcy Gass

customer_reviews.title: Super cool!
customer_reviews.text: Super awesome! Came fully charged and ready to go after a quick and painless assembly. My son is 6 but is too big for a hotwheel. This was our answer to the problem, and it was well worth it. I weigh 210lbs and it pulls me, though it's not comfortable to ride in being my size. I imagine my son will get many years of fun out of it!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Buy the non electric one !
customer_reviews.text: DON’T BUY ! I bought this for my grandson and had to have it replaced as it stopped working within one weeks. He’s only seven. I returned that one and amazon replaced it quickly. Then that one also stopped working again. I had thrown away the original box as I expected no problems with the replacement. It was hard to find a box that would fit it and by the time I did the return had expired. So I was out of the $153 altogether. I give this Razor product a low review and recommend you buy the one not electric where they have to peddle themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid scooter/tricycle.
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old loves this thing! He whips around in the driveway like crazy. Pros- Charge lasts much longer than expected. Built well Price Super fun Cons- Seat isn’t adjustable Wheels could be a bit wider to help stability (not a big issue) Throttle is on/off button and not variable. Not big enough for dad to ride. ;) Great item!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Best 7yo gift!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 7yo and this has been his favorite present he's ever received across birthdays and Christmas'. He's on this thing almost every day and has finally gotten the knack of drifting through turns. He rides it on some rather bumpy paved terrain and paver bricks so the bolts that hold on the back two casters have had to be replaced but with as hard as he rides this I'm not upset with that at all. Love this "scooter"!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey B. Paul

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality Product and offered Insurance sucks
customer_reviews.text: This is useless product with very inferior quality. Bought a warranty plan which is equally useless as when you call them with issue, they troubleshoot with you while on phone. they don't recommend any shop for repair etc. you end up fixing it yourself. To be more specific about quality. The chain keeps on falling off and does not hook up anymore after i pulled it few times. its hassle to open the front panel and hook up chain all the time. Quality is bad.
customer_reviews.author: Ajay Garyali

customer_reviews.title: Early Christmas gifts
customer_reviews.text: My 7 yro nephew and 4 yro niece have enjoyed their early Christmas gifts. I gave was worried that one may not work so they got them early in case we needed to return them. It’s the perfect size for my above average nephew and my niece is able to scoot up to put her feet on the pedal and with the gas/power being a push button they both can ride with ease!
customer_reviews.author: Jewell

customer_reviews.title: It’s a hit!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 kids (and all the neighborhood kids) love this thing! We bought it 2 years ago and it is still a favorite! We are just now needing to buy a new battery for it because it isn’t holding a charge well.
customer_reviews.author: Tamra

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Fun! Awesome! Get it!
customer_reviews.text: We've only had these a few days but these are THE BEST, most FUN things EVER!!! We bought two of these for our boys for Christmas for an awesome price. My 7yr old hasn't tried it out yet because he's afraid of everything, but my 6yr old is having so much fun! I've even given a couple of tries (ok, just as much as my son) and I am having a blast, as well!!! I'll be ordering myself something similar (for an actually adult) this weekend!! I've read about the complaints of the wheels so I'll just prepare myself for that. It's worth it for us. Lots of fun!!!! I feel like a kid again!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a waste of money. Bought one of these for my 6 year old’s birthday and the front wheel seized in the first 10 minutes, after we fixed that, the chain fell off. We returned it for a replacement. The replacement worked for exactly 5 minutes before the chain fell off of it. My kid loved the 15 minutes that the toy worked and was broken hearted after two failures. Razor needs to do better!
customer_reviews.author: carli kay crook

customer_reviews.title: I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THIS MONEY PIT OF A TOY.
customer_reviews.text: Kids absolutely love this thing. Heck, if I fit in it, I would ride it too. Unfortunately, after just 3 weeks of use the rear plastic/rubber tires in the back casters are already torn up making this ride unbearable for even an 8 yr old. Replacements of the caster wheel and some other part cost $70 per wheel. Replacing the wheels costs the same as buying a whole new ride. This thing is like printer..great until you need to replace toner and the toner costs more than than a new printer. I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THIS MONEY PIT OF A TOY. Too bad I can’t return it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam F.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed!! Bought this for my daughter for Christmas. She rode it for maybe a minute and the chain would come off. My dad would fix it and then it would keep coming off. And it’s not an easy fix. You have to take apart the cover to do so. There is nothing worse than to have a new toy and you can’t even play on it. I returned it and went to academy and bought the tuenado. Much better!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: So much fun! Bought this for my 12 year old son and he loves it! Also dad and myself (who are both over the weight limit) could ride it and enjoyed ourselves as well! Fun gift for any kid!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but battery doesn't last long at all.
customer_reviews.text: Battery drains quickly and needs a long time to charge. After a 24 hour charge, the battery drained after 15 minutes of play time. We have 4 kids trying to share this toy. Every hour charge only gives about 2 minutes of play time. Maybe I got a lemon, I won't be getting another.
customer_reviews.author: Gus90720

customer_reviews.title: horrible battery
customer_reviews.text: I charged this for over 24 hrs and it still would only last for 10 minutes before needing another charge.
customer_reviews.author: rdog

customer_reviews.title: Broke less than 6 months!
customer_reviews.text: We were so excited to give this to our 8 yr old. He had a peddle powered one that he loves, so we knew this would be a hit. Well it was, for less than 6 months! The front wheel locked up so now we just have a useless piece of junk in the garage. Sure, I guess we could take it apart and see if we can fix it but I would expect something like that to happen after we've had it for a much longer time period. So if you want some very temporary fun, give this a whirl. Otherwise look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Stephenie N.

customer_reviews.title: Troublesome
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 7 year old for his birthday two weeks ago. The product has worked ok until today. Now all of the sudden every time he turns the handlebar the chain comes off and locks the wheel up. Ive placed it back on three times but it keeps happening. Ive contacted Razor to see what they will do about the issue, it just seems ridiculous to have these issues after two weeks. We shall see what they say.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So fast it flew apart
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome and is super fun for a dare devil kid. However, this electric trike lasted 6 months before breaking. As noted by another reviewer: “Underneath the seat, the seating frame connects (two separate pieces). It is this connection point that fails.” The screw became dislodged and the seat disassembled while in use. It literally broke into two pieces as she was riding it. Cool bike, and hopefully can be fixed with a modification. Just watch for this issue and make sure your kid is wearing a helmet!
customer_reviews.author: SusieHolm

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 of these at once for each of my kids. They only worked for a month the one chain broke and the other two the motor went. Amazon did nothing to help. Very disappointing considering this was $400+ purchase and no resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Busy mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!!! Complete garbage!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this razor 360 for a Christmas gift for my 8 yr old in November. Unfortunately due to the cold winter months, didn’t have a chance to get it going until March. Worked well for about 2 days. Battery went dead. Followed all the charging rules. Back wheel also sheered off. Bought a back up battery and purchased a new charger as well, they did not work either. So disappointed, plus can’t return it since i bought it in November. Will never purchase a razor product ever again nor will i ever recommend one.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Contaldi

customer_reviews.title: IF they worked, awesome. Sadly they didn't.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of the 360 spinners and one one lasted more than 15 minutes. Internal chain fell off. I tore it apart and fixed it only to have it fall off 30 seconds later when riding. The chain tensioner doesn't hold enough pressure and it falls off. I returned one and the new one I received did the exact same thing after 1 day. Sucks because these were a guy with the kids and they loved them. Returned them for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Bri M.

customer_reviews.title: Valve stem issue
customer_reviews.text: Only issue I have is the valve stem to inflate tire is hard to use. The valve stem does not align straight with hole. The valve stem was pointing to the left and not straight. Couple that with a short valve extender it is very hard to align with the valve stem to thread. Rides well and the charge last sufficiently for my boy to have a great time. He enjoys it very much. As noted the only issue I have the valve stem does not align straight and makes it very difficult to inflate the tire.
customer_reviews.author: LA GRIFTER

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea, Poorly Designed
customer_reviews.text: We started out with one of these. It was a huge hit for the entire neighborhood. I ended up ordering a second one. The day the new one came, the 1st one broke. I put the 2nd one together and it broke the same day. I had to take them both apart to find that the chain was off. Got the chain back on both of them, then they were off again. The chains will NOT stay on or even last through 1 ride around the neighborhood. Very disappointed in Razor. I would look at alternate brands and bypass the Razor.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun
customer_reviews.text: My son is having the best time but the wheel came off because you have to assemble yourself and I guess I didn’t tighten tighten up so now I have to find a bolt to put the wheel back on but other than our user error he loved it and he will continue to love it as soon as I can get the bolt back on so tighten your bolts if you’re assembling
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Tumlinson

customer_reviews.title: we got a lemon!
customer_reviews.text: we waited 3 weeks for it to arrive....We charged the battery for 12 hrs, assembled it, and my son tried to ride it. It lasted 2 seconds before the chain slipped off. So, we brought it inside, re-attached the chain, crossed our fingers and let our son try it again. It lasted 2 seconds and slipped off. So, now I believe we got a lemon and will be returning it. We are all so bummed out.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob E.

customer_reviews.title: Very good so far
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. My 7 year old son has used four times now. Holds charge as advertised 30-40 minutes. He was scared at first because it swings around so fast, Kind of like the way a tilt a whirl spins. But he tried again and loves it. We have a pretty steep hill in front of us and it goes up pretty well. Assembly was pretty easy. Came half charged, mostly metal so frame seems durable. So far it is holding charge
customer_reviews.author: Jd

customer_reviews.title: Razor bike
customer_reviews.text: Is a nice bike , really needs to follow weight because it can brake easy. Goes smooth but is not meant to go over some bumps will stop then will continue going.my son's razor still working he takes care of it but my neighbors kid razor broke , bigger kids try to use it and didnt last.
customer_reviews.author: Emilio Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Must get
customer_reviews.text: We loved it .. if you weigh 130 -140 lbs the razor could handle the weight and can’t handle uphill. I did do a 360 throttle but it was scary fun. My son is under 100 lbs and the razor took off and he was loving it . When he did his turns or the 360 throttle he loved it . We had ppl who stopped in and watched my son so he loved that . I do recommend a 2nd battery because after a hr use it started dying out ..
customer_reviews.author: Annette Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Great ride...great price
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my grandson he's 4 and he loves it...I thought it would take him a week or two to get the hang of it because of his age but he was driving and spinning it the first day...I had to place a small pillow behind his back because his feet kept slipping off the foot rest. ..the seat doesn't adjust that's the only flaw I noticed...great buy for $137
customer_reviews.author: Gwen king

customer_reviews.title: This things movesssssss!!!
customer_reviews.text: Took a little effort to put together! The sturdiness and durability are 4 out of 5 stars because my son says over small pebbles or small bumps it really vibrates the chair and after 10 mins or so it can make yojr kids butt numb!!! Lol... i suggest a small pillow or something to sit on!!! Aye this thing moves!!!! Doesnt underestimate the twists and turns this thing does...its legit...goes a perfect speed!!! It does take some practice to learn how to drift on this(took my boys a couple times to get it) All in all i wish i had one for me!! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Anzalone

customer_reviews.title: Loads of fun, even if only briefly
customer_reviews.text: My kids have enjoyed this since the day it arrived. It's perfect for 8-10 year olds (55-75 lbs). The conversation among all the dads is "If only they had that when I was a kid!" Only downside: although it says a fully charged battery is good for 30 minutes, we haven't gotten more than 15-20 minutes of use out of it at a time and the battery takes 12 hours to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Mickle

customer_reviews.title: Once worked great - the other had a defective battery which really ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 for twins birthday party. Once worked great - the other had a defective battery which really took away from the fun for the event. Following Monday spent 45 minutes on phone explaining systems only for their "Great" customer service to say they will ship out a new battery as replacement in "10 business days". Inquired about quicker shipment and they said "not an option". Now that's great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Much Enjoyed
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun for our grandchildren ages 5 and 6! They love the 360 turns. Speed is perfect for the spins. Battery lasts about an hour. Recommend elbow and knee pads. Not terribly fast but tips sometimes while doing 360's. Max battery usage about an hour. No issues so far w/ rough and tumble boys.
customer_reviews.author: Mercy94

customer_reviews.title: Back wheels fall apart
customer_reviews.text: The caster wheels on back have both fallen apart in less than 30 days Now it’s not useable without constant bumping This was only used on flat driveway nothing tough or extreme Also some seat bolts were missing 😔
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Went together quick and easy. My kids love this thing, I have rode it too it’s super fun. I bought it for my 7 year old but my 2 yo and my 12 yo both ride the heck out of it. My 2 yo can’t reach the pegs with his feet so he just pulls them up and rides on.
customer_reviews.author: LaQuita Grayson

customer_reviews.title: My son loves
customer_reviews.text: My son could ride for hours. Even though it says 1/2 hour ride time, my son can get at least an hour in before I make him head home to charge it. Not sure if we could push it longer, havent tried. Word of advice: get a helmet. Just do it. It can turn over easy if they do the 360 spin too fast
customer_reviews.author: DeCosmo & Rolon

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my 9 year old son as ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9 year old son as a gift and he loves it! And so does his cousins (ages 12, 13). Update: stopped working after about two months!!! Literally just shut down as my nephew was riding it causing him to flip off!!!! It will not work at all anymore...the red light on the switch comes on and that’s it. My son iwas so sad and heartbroken. I would have expected this product to last for longer than just 2-3 months!
customer_reviews.author: naimah hasan

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 8 year old for Christmas. She was able to take it out and ride it on Christmas morning. Provided much entertainment for her riding it and for everyone else watching! Definitely glad I purchased a helmet for her as well, as this thing whips around rather quickly! I see it being used for some time to come.
customer_reviews.author: Lumpy

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: POS dont buy Razor has the worst customer service possible. After 2 times riding the chain popped off called razor them made ME pay for a replacement part. I waited months for the part to arrive only to have the part not correct it and when i called them to explain they said it was now past the 6 month warranty which of course it was since it took 4 months to get the part. so now we have a hunk of crap in our garage
customer_reviews.author: Karen Ross

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy anything from razor!  Your kids will be very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product or any other product from razor.com. I purchased a electric go cart at Christmas time for my grandson and it doesn’t work. I called the phone number listed and they sent me a new battery and it still does not work. They refuse to send me a new go cart It’s been almost 3 months of dealing with them while my grandson is in tears. I’ve never dealt with a company this bad before.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Good choice!
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves it although it does spin fast. She continually sticks her legs out. Once her leg twisted under part of it and I thought she'd break her foot! She loves to pretend she's qualifying for an Olympic team, she goes straight for that. It's very sturdy and should last a few years, her 5 year old sister can't wait to reach the foot rest.
customer_reviews.author: Gma Susan

customer_reviews.title: Most fun for the money
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to imagine a more fun gift at this price point for a 5 to, maybe, 10 or 12 year old. I got one for my daughter (8 yrs) and one for my son (6 yrs). They have an absolute blast on it. The build quality is very high, and assembly was very easy (using only the two allen wrenches provided in the box) - I was able to put together two of them in less than a half hour. I only wish the adult-sized version was a bit cheaper - watching my kids ride around on these really makes me want one of my own! A+
customer_reviews.author: Elemeno

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 6 yr old for Christmas. Easy to assemble. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loads of Fun
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. Takes a super long time to charge, but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: WLam

customer_reviews.title: My 5 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: I was worried at first that it would be too hard for my 5 year old to manage but he can reach the pedals just fine and he is a little guy. He loved having something motorized to use to keep up with his older siblings on their electric scooters. He isn’t too into the spinning yet so it’s nice that he can control it and ride straight on the sidewalk without spinning. His older brother really enjoys the 360 spinning.
customer_reviews.author: Kerie

customer_reviews.title: Nope. Just keep scrolling
customer_reviews.text: Complete junk. It was fun for about 12 min when the bolt fell out of the back castor wheel. I replaced that and charged it up for my son just to find the battery won’t take a charge. Will barely creep forward with a 60 pound kid after 10 hrs of charging. Very disappointed little kid the day after Xmas just wanted to try his new gift. Fun concept but razor completely failed on this cheap horrible attempt at a product
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Money!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fun for my son - the few minutes it works! But it likes to stop unexpectedly (after being fully charged), and the wheel gets stuck. It's been more of a pain than anything. Contacted Razor directly and we are trying to get a refund. Very disappointed. I'd expect a $150 "toy" to work well, and for longer than a few minutes at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Indu F

customer_reviews.title: Ran good for about a week
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandson for Christmas, living in the midwest with the snow and cold he was unable to ride it for a few months, He absolutely loved it when he was able to get on it. it was awesome!! However, lasted about a week when the tire broke and it started not charging. Of course I was out of the timeline for a return due to having to wait for good weather.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Pike

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 yr old loves it.... it says for 8 yr olds and older, but we gave it a try. It’s really fun and I’m very pleased with our our purchase. I’d recommend a smooth, flat surface..... our local sidewalks are a bit difficult with the smaller back wheels.
customer_reviews.author: zora sabrina andrich

customer_reviews.title: Fun, fun, fun!!
customer_reviews.text: The only knock is the battery is about 30 mins drive time which means anout an hour of fun. Otherwise this is great and would recommend especially for refurb price, great savings!
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Break easy
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for a couple months my son is 4 and rides it maybe 1 time a week the wheel and bearing already broke
customer_reviews.author: Chad b.

customer_reviews.title: Not happy at all
customer_reviews.text: The only good thing I can say is that it arrived when it was suppose to. I bought in October in preparation for Christmas. Weight limit says 120, my son is 90 pounds and it will not move. Of course i went to return it and couldn't. My son is out his #1 item in his list and I wasted a ton of money.
customer_reviews.author: Shea Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Jealous I cant ride it too!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! Got it for a 5 yr old. She loves it! It was easy to put together and so fat seems pretty sturdy. I will update if anything breaks as mentioned in the other reviews. The only thing I dont like about it is I'm too fat to ride it!!
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Cool product.
customer_reviews.text: Waited for 3 weeks to post as I wanted to ensure first. But this is a great product, lice it. Bought it for my 7 yr old and he just can't stop riding it.. even my 12 yr old loves it. The trike is super easy to assemble, both boys did it themselves (in ~30 mins) with me just watching over. Easy to learn and fun to ride. Will post rating on durability in about 3 mths from now, but till then, happy to have bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 for our great nephews for Christmas and they love. Easy installation. Grownups gave it a spin as enjoyed them as much as the kids and there was no issue with speed.
customer_reviews.author: Kele

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: he loved it, and still rides it all the time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old was able to assemble it with in 20 minutes all by himself. Its very assemble friendly. We had it for over a year and battery life still going strong
customer_reviews.author: Svetlana Morgun

customer_reviews.title: Chain falling !!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I cant return it because I took it overseas as a Christmas present for my son . After 10 minutes on it the chain fell. We opened it and put it back but it keeps on falling... so disappointed. He was really exited to get it. After that, I read some reviews saying that that is a big issue with this item. If you are lucky you get the good one but is a 50/50 possibility of getting the one with the chain problem. Is not an easy fix
customer_reviews.author: Pau

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old LOVES this ride on. The only problem we have came across is the chain pops off A LOT. If I didn’t have a husband it would stay broken because it’s a tedious task to take it a part and put the chain back on.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of dragons x3

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool, my son loves his!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 and a half year old son. It took him about 10 mins to figure it out and learn the control and be zipping around. He absolutely loves this thing. To be honest I am a little jealous. It looks like so much fun. Very easy to assemble, very easy to use. My son is kind of tall for his age and he reaches the foot pegs, but if he was much shorter it would be hard to reach them. But overall this product is pretty awesome. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: clyde betts

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun! My 4 & 8 year old boys love ...
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of speed, Lots of fun! My 4 & 8 year old boys love it! Quick assembly, has to charge for around 8-9 hours before first use per the instructions manual. Power lasts a long time and is a blast for the kids. Charging indicator light on adaptor shows you when it's ready to go. Would definitely recommend for ages 12 and under. Older kids might want something a little more fast and dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Didnt last but a month
customer_reviews.text: Was a Christmas gift for my 10 year old son and it was pretty awesome for a month. Driven less than 20 times and now it keeps breaking down. Having issues with the chain.. very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Kat white

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son's birthday, charged it 12 hours accoring to instructions but it only lasts 5mins at a time and needs to be charged again. What a let down. I will be returning!
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: 3 of my kids love these.
customer_reviews.text: 3 of my kids love these.. we have 2, only problem is one isn’t charging any more and we have only had it since Christmas.. so 3 months!!
customer_reviews.author: tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: My 6yr old LOVES this, the best thing weve ever purchased. Our 9 and 10yr olds love it too. Our 6 yr old barely reached the pedals but theres room for her to grow in it and enjoy it for years to come. Battery lasts well over an hour, she rides it down to the park and back home. Easy to learn how to handle and control
customer_reviews.author: Vickie A Martin

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this he has so much fun on it and it can really pick up speed. Make sure you have helmets and pads because it will tip and can throw your child off.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Flatley

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter 9yo daughter LOVES this thing! It charges well and the battery last quite a while. Glad we bought it. Side note I bought the razor crazy cart for my 12yo from somewhere else and it has been junk! I've had to fix it 3 times now. This razor trike is built 10x better!
customer_reviews.author: Advantage Home Solutions

customer_reviews.title: My son loved the Power Rider but it broker within 4 months ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loved the Power Rider but it broker within 4 months from normal use. Can hear the motor running but the front wheel doesn't spin. $100 product totally dead. Why the does the manufacturer only offer a 90 day warranty? Perhaps it is because the product is not built well.
customer_reviews.author: S.E.

customer_reviews.title: Exciting
customer_reviews.text: My grands loves this razor. It has speed and its fun to watch your kids enjoy themselves. Wish the battery would last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Seletha Gartrell

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last very long
customer_reviews.text: This was a great ride for my 8 year old son, he loved it, right up until it stopped working. The battery still holds a full charge and the motor still turns but it doesn't have enough power to move when he sits on it (he's 50 lbs) . It lasted probably 15 months and that was not using it during the winter. The bike is in great shape, looks new but it's now worthless. Sturdy construction but the motor is cheap. Don't buy this...
customer_reviews.author: joseph

customer_reviews.title: The worst
customer_reviews.text: My son rode this Christmas morning ONCE and then chain broke. I called Razor and they said they'd send me a new chain!? Um, no thanks. I don't feel like I should have to completely disassemble a toy and get into the motor of it to make it work. I'll be contacting amazon and asking for a full refund. Bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Beach

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging
customer_reviews.text: Got two of these for my boys, they was really fun and prices good. But they both stopped charging after a month. I would not recommend them to a friend. Also my neighbor bought one for their boy and it stopped charging after two weeks .
customer_reviews.author: Stacyrose

customer_reviews.title: Fun fun fun
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had it but a few days and no issues yet. Lasts about 20-30 minutes. My child is 50 lbs and like 50” or so and barely reaches so pay attention when ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my youngest (6) and my 12 year old doesn't get off of it. Its super easy for all ages to use, safe and just a blast. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Perez

customer_reviews.title: broke in 2 days
customer_reviews.text: I should start with, we bought this because my son's friend had it. When he took it to his house to ride it, it broke within 30 minutes. There is a little gear on the bolt coming off the motor that broke. Tried calling razor customer support and all they could do was send me a chain tensioner. So now it is useless.
customer_reviews.author: SKI

customer_reviews.title: On 4th trike in less than 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: We've gone through 4 trikes. First one, the gears stopped working. Trikes two and three the front wheels lock up while kids are riding them. So far, our 4th one is working fine. The kids have a blast with them but the batteries last only 30 minutes for my smaller kids and maybe 20 minutes with my 75 pound child. I'm really disappointed in these.
customer_reviews.author: djb

customer_reviews.title: Fun Toy! My daughter has owned now almost two years now and it's still going strong.
customer_reviews.text: I held off making a review to see how the product was going to hold up over time. It's been a couple years and it still runs just as good as the day we bought it. The only issue we had is that the screws holding the seat on fall out occasionally. That's the only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for young children
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it and so does the neighbors children. I bought this for my son when he turned 5. He’ll be able to use it for a couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Trike!!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 7.5 yr old son for Christmas and it’s a hit. It’s not cheaply made and has a great turning radius.
customer_reviews.author: The Parcel's

customer_reviews.title: Motor seizes up after only short use.
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box it was easy to assemble. However, after about an hour of riding the motor seized up. I bought a replacement motor and that seized up as well. There is obviously something wrong with this product. Would not suggest buying it. It is just a worthless pile of parts now. Not going to spend another $60 buck on an motor that seizes up after 30 minutes use.
customer_reviews.author: James M Donich

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 7 months!
customer_reviews.text: bought two of these for my kids for Christmas, 7 months ago. The kids loved them and have used them quite a bit ever since. Unfortunately, a few days ago one stopped working. will charge and light comes on, but the button that causes the bike to go doesn't do anything. Very disappointed that we only got 7 months of use out of it. Thought I would contact Razor, but the warranty is ONLY 90 DAYS. I thought for sure it would be 12 months, but only 90 Days is very disappointing for a major manufacturer like Razor.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan G.

customer_reviews.title: 6-year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for 6-year old granddaughter for xmas, she loves it! really simple assembly, keeps its charge and rolls over grass. great little trike
customer_reviews.author: maggie

customer_reviews.title: The best rider
customer_reviews.text: This rider is absolutely my sons favorite. He just get on and ride all day. Great battery life, very fast and easy to put away.
customer_reviews.author: Bigham1973

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, charge and store. Grandkids were a little afraid at first, but really enjoy them now.
customer_reviews.author: slmccoy

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: My son likes it good enough, but after riding 3 times the bolt to one of the back wheels came off and it was lost. He saw it after he got off. We went to Lowe’s and bought another, but what if the wheel had of come off while he was riding it?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery is crap
customer_reviews.text: Have not even had this for a year. Stored all winter long in our basement. Bring it up for the spring battery is toast. Call about our “warranty” that we purchased. Yes it was only good for 90 days. Give me a break. Now we are responsible for a new battery. Will not buy a Razor product again!!
customer_reviews.author: Jami Evans

customer_reviews.title: He loved it! He has only gotten to ride it ...
customer_reviews.text: We gave this to our son in April for his birthday. He loved it! He has only gotten to ride it a handful of times because he needs supervision while on it. We took it out today. He rode it for 15 minutes and it quit working. The front wheel locked up and it will do nothing. He has only had it for 2 months and maybe been on it 5 times. It should not already be broken:(
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Evans

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loves this
customer_reviews.text: It took a bit of time to assemble but my grandson loves it. Wish the battery lasted a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Rosanne L.

customer_reviews.title: Still Extremely happy at this point
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 9yr old nephew for Christmas. He LOVES It!❤ Took no time to put together and it had a charge so he could just TAKE OFF! The only thing is he's almost 5ft already and I wish the seat could slide back just a little further for him to have a little more room! Still Extremely happy at this point!!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Shindle

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sons birthday the 2nd time he rode it it would barley go fast the 3rd time the back wheel fell off. I've bought other razor products and liked them. After this I will not. I need this fixed!!
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: Fun and fast
customer_reviews.text: Update: After about three years, this ride on toy still works great. All the kids love to ride on it. This has been a great toy for outdoors. We haven’t had to replace the battery, and we it still holds a good charge. I highly recommend this toy. Original: My two sons, ages 6 and almost 10, love this ride-on. The battery seems to last and it rides smooth (and faster than I thought). It was a great Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: My son likes this but the major problem is that ...
customer_reviews.text: My son likes this but the major problem is that you have to charge it for many hours just to get 30 -60 minutes of use.
customer_reviews.author: Alter Ego

customer_reviews.title: Gets going pretty well and battery life hasn't been an issue
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old loves this, purchased as a gift for his birthday. My 4 and 6 year old also use this with no problems. Gets going pretty well and battery life hasn't been an issue, keeping them off of it in the house has but it's a great product that any kid will love
customer_reviews.author: brent

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this thing! It’s very sturdy and my 6 year old enjoys it as much as my 13 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra McQuillan

product_meta.title: Razor Power Rider 360 Electric Tricycle
product_meta.description:
Blast into the future with the Power Rider 360 - the all-new, electric powered three-wheeler from Razor. With the push of a button, you're off - no pedaling required. Race at speeds up to 9 mph, cut full 360 degree spins, slide, even drift on Power Rider 360's high-performance duel inclined rear caster wheels. Features a chain-driven motor, with push button throttle, up to 40 minutes of continuous use, front, hand operated braking system, welded steel frame with moto-style double crown fork design, hi-impact pneumatic front wheel, rear, dual inclined casters for drifting and spinning action, rubber grips and folding foot pegs. Also includes, a12V sealed lead acid rechargeable battery system with charger. 12 hour battery charge time. Recommended for ages 8 and older and will support a rider up to 120 pounds. The buyer and rider of the Power Rider 360 are responsible for knowing and obeying all local, state and federal regulations regarding the riding and use of all Razor electric vehicles and scooters.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Blast into the future with the PowerRider 360 - the all-new, electric powered three-wheeler from Razor! With the push of a button, you're off - no pedaling required. Race at speeds up to 9 mph, cut full 360 degree spins, slide, even drift on PowerRider 360's high-performance duel inclined rear caster wheels. Features a chain-driven motor, with push button throttle, up to 40 minutes of continuous use, front, hand operated braking system, welded steel frame with moto-style double crown fork design, hi-impact pneumatic front wheel, rear, dual inclined casters for drifting and spinning action, rubber grips, and folding foot pegs. Also includes, a12V sealed lead acid rechargeable battery system with charger. 12 hour battery charge time. Recommended for ages 8 and older and will support a rider up to 120 pounds. The buyer and rider of the PowerRider 360 are responsible for knowing and obeying all local, state and federal regulations regarding the riding and use of all Razor electric vehicles and scooters.
feature_bullets: Blast into the future with the PowerRider 360 - all-new, electric powered 3-wheeler from Razor!
Features push button throttle and reaches speeds up to 9 mph with up to 30 minutes of continuous use
Cut full 360 degree spins, slide, even drift on its duel inclined rear caster wheels
Includes front, hand operated braking system, hi-impact pneumatic front wheel, 12V rechargeable battery system, and charger
Recommended for ages 8 and up; supports riders up to 120 pounds
